name: Hidden Girl
description: "Hidden Girl" is a casual and relaxing game made by "dream editor". Challenge various levels and unlock your beautiful girl!Game FeaturesA total of 16 beautiful girls are waiting for you to unlock ~ Simple operation, just use the mouse to click to play the game. Rich and varied levels, illustrations are not all static, they also rotate and zoom. You need to find the right opportunity to pass the level more easily! Relaxing music and beautiful pictures will relieve your fatigue of the day ~
